statements: SELECT * FROM EmployeePerformance;
SELECT employee_name, performance_score FROM EmployeePerformance WHERE tasks_assigned > 10;
SELECT * FROM EmployeePerformance WHERE performance_score < 50.0;
SELECT employee_id, evaluation_date FROM EmployeePerformance WHERE evaluation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM EmployeePerformance ORDER BY employee_name DESC, employee_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeePerformance WHERE performance_score > 8.0 ORDER BY employee_name ASC
SELECT employee_name, tasks_assigned FROM EmployeePerformance WHERE evaluation_date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT AVG(performance_score) AS avg_performance_score, COUNT(employee_id) AS total_employees FROM EmployeePerformance
SELECT employee_name, performance_score FROM EmployeePerformance WHERE tasks_assigned BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY performance_score DESC
SELECT * FROM EmployeePerformance WHERE employee_name LIKE 'J%'
SELECT * FROM EmployeePerformance;
SELECT employee_name, performance_rating FROM EmployeePerformance ORDER BY performance_rating DESC;
SELECT task_description, assigned_to_employee_id FROM TaskAssignment WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM EmployeePerformance WHERE performance_rating < 3;
SELECT * FROM TaskAssignment ORDER BY deadline ASC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeePerformance WHERE performance_rating >= 4
SELECT * FROM EmployeePerformance WHERE employee_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY performance_rating DESC
SELECT employee_name, performance_rating FROM EmployeePerformance ORDER BY performance_rating ASC
SELECT * FROM TaskAssignment WHERE deadline > '2023-01-01' AND task_description LIKE '%report%'
SELECT employee_name, task_description FROM EmployeePerformance JOIN TaskAssignment ON EmployeePerformance.employee_id = TaskAssignment.assigned_to_employee_id
SELECT * FROM EmployeePerformance;
SELECT employee_id, performance_score FROM EmployeePerformance WHERE performance_score > 80;
SELECT task_assigned, performance_score FROM EmployeePerformance ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT task_assigned, performance_score FROM EmployeePerformance WHERE employee_id = 5;
SELECT task_assigned, performance_score FROM EmployeePerformance WHERE performance_score < 50;
SELECT * FROM EmployeePerformance WHERE performance_score > 80 ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT task_assigned FROM EmployeePerformance WHERE performance_score < 60;
SELECT employee_id, task_description FROM TaskEvaluation WHERE evaluation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT employee_id, feedback_date, improvement_suggestion FROM ImprovementFeedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-07-01' ORDER BY feedback_date ASC;
SELECT employee_id, task_id, evaluation_result FROM TaskEvaluation WHERE employee_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT employee_id, name, department FROM Employee ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT task_name, start_date, end_date, status FROM Task WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT employee_id, task_id, rating FROM Performance WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT * FROM Facility WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY facility_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT name, department FROM Employee WHERE hire_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT e.name, t.task_name, p.rating FROM Employee e JOIN Task t ON e.employee_id = t.employee_id JOIN Performance p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id WHERE p.rating > 3;
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM Employee ORDER BY department ASC;
SELECT facility_name, location, COUNT(*) AS total_capacity FROM Facility GROUP BY facility_name, location ORDER BY total_capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT name, hire_date FROM Employee WHERE department='HR';
SELECT task_id, description, deadline FROM Task WHERE completed=FALSE;
SELECT review_id, employee_id, performance_rating, review_date, comments FROM PerformanceReview ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT facility_name, location, capacity FROM Facility WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY facility_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT name, department FROM Employee WHERE hire_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, name, department FROM Employee WHERE department = 'Engineering';
SELECT * FROM Task WHERE completed = TRUE ORDER BY deadline DESC;

SELECT Task.task_id, Task.description, TaskAssignment.employee_id, Employee.name FROM Task INNER JOIN TaskAssignment ON Task.task_id = TaskAssignment.task_id INNER JOIN Employee ON TaskAssignment.employee_id = Employee.employee_id ORDER BY TaskAssignment.assign_date ASC;
